â€”
Europe's biggest hackathon has landed in Busan. JUNCTION ASIA will be held from August 19 (Fri) to 21 (Sun), 2022. Feel the heating vibe of JUNCTION ASIA in Korea's largest maritime city!
JUNCTION ASIA is an event where global participants from various fields, such as developers, designers, and entrepreneurs, collaborate for 48 hours to derive solutions to technical challenges presented by global tech companies (Track Partners).
*The official language is English.
Participants
300 developers, designers, and entrepreneurs who are high school students or older who want to participate in JUNCTION ASIA.
Application
ğŸ‘‰ https://ja2022.party/link/apply
Participants will receive the result of acceptence after submitting the application form on the website. (individual/team)
*Maximum team size: 5 people.
Application period: first week of July - July 24
Participant acceptance notice: July 31
*High school students can only apply as a team
*High school students must additionally submit a parental consent form
Prizes and offers
A total of â‚©10,000,000 in prize money / â‚©3,000,000 worth of giveaways
The final winner team gets tickets to participate in Finland JUNCTION, Europe's biggest hackathon.
*Partial support for airfare
Hotel accommodation (2 nights) for all participants, meals and snacks provided. Welcome kit provided.
Hackathon timetable
Competition Period: August 19 [Fri] - August 21 [Sun]
Day 1: Topic Presentation, Team Building
Day 2: Prototype production by team and booth exhibition, mentoring provided by incumbents of global tech companies.
Day 3: Presentation of results, awards.
Contact
e-mail: asia@hackjunction.com
instagram: @junctionasia
